title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Oklahoma City National Memorial Ranger Talk: Between the Gates of Time      Location: Terrace Benches at the 9:01 Gate Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/26/2016 to 09/04/2016 Join a ranger in an exploration of the story of the Oklahoma City 1995 bombing.  Elements of the event can be found symbolically represented throughout the entire Outdoor Memorial.
